sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-row class="ma-12 elevation-20 d-flex mx-auto" style="width: 50vw">
    <v-carousel
        continuous
        interval="7000"
        cycle
        :show-arrows="false"
        hide-delimiter-background
        delimiter-icon="mdi-minus"
        height="54vh"
    >
      <v-carousel-item
          v-for="(slide, i) in slides"
          :key="i"
          :src="slide"
      >
        <template v-slot:img="{ props }">
          <v-img
              v-bind="props"
              gradient="to top right, rgba(55,236,186,.7), rgba(25,32,72,.7)"
          ></v-img>
        </template>
      </v-carousel-item>
    </v-carousel>
  </v-row>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "TheIndexViewCarousel",
  data: () => ({
    colors: [
      'green',
      'secondary',
      'yellow darken-4',
      'red lighten-2',
      'orange darken-1',
    ],
        slides: [
        require("../../../../../assets/images/index_carousel.jpg"),
        require("../../../../../assets/images/master.jpg"),
    ],
  }),
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
